title: Sampler, 1796
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch with withdrawn and deflected element work on plain weave foundation
inscribed: Polley Thomas was born April 01 1784 and worked this sampler in the 12 year of my age 1796
dimensions: H x W x D: 48.3 x 48.3 cm (19 x 19 in.) framed dimensions
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description: Bands of alphabets worked in several colors on a coarse brown ground, with the inscription: Polley Thomas was born April 01 1784 and worked this sampler in the 12 year of my age 1796

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1796.
1796. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch with withdrawn and deflected element work on plain weave foundation. Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers. 2002-26-4.
